column1: mrs. dolores t. pietras| dolores t. pietras (nee jozefowski)
column3: 2015. beloved wife of the late edward. loving mother of mary ann (the late larry) molda
column5: and lawrence (laura). dearest grandmother of 11. adored great grandmother of 3. dear sister of edwin ozzie (joan) josephs
column7: and the late virginia and leroy schurwanz. long time parishioner of st. francis of assisi (kostner & augusta) and long time employee of st. annes hospital. funeral saturday 10:30 a. m. to st. constance church for 11:00 a. m. mass. interment maryhill cemetery. visiting hours 4:00 p. m. 9:00 p. m. at muzyka & son funeral home
column9: 60630. memorial donations to st. jude thaddeus fund
column12: would be greatly appreciated. for info 773-545-3800 or visit dolores memorial at www. muzykafuneralhome. com. upcoming events. visitationjun 12. 4:00 pm - 9:00 pm muzyka & son funeral home5776 west lawrence avenue. chicago
